notes.convert_to_sealed: System will be converted from open vent to sealed.
notes.keep_open_vent: System remains open vented with existing feed and expansion tanks retained.
notes.remove_fe_tanks: Remove feed and expansion tanks and cap redundant pipework.
notes.dhw_now_mains: Hot water will be mains pressure; confirm compatibility of showers and taps.
notes.remove_shower_pumps: Remove any shower pumps; not suitable for pressurised systems.
notes.g3_req: Unvented cylinder installation to be completed by a G3-certified engineer; provide discharge pipework and tundish as per Building Regulations.
notes.remove_vented_cyl: Remove vented cylinder and associated cold water storage.
notes.retain_vented_cyl: Retain vented cylinder and cold water storage; check condition and insulation.
notes.retain_unvented: Retain existing unvented cylinder; confirm annual service and verify discharge/mixing arrangements.
notes.install_unvented: Install unvented cylinder with pressure reducing valve and compliant discharge to outside.
notes.fanned_horizontal: Install fanned horizontal flue to manufacturer instructions.
notes.fanned_vertical: Install fanned vertical flue through roof with approved flashing kit.
notes.terminal_clearances: Ensure flue terminal clearances comply with BS 5440.
notes.plume_kit: Add plume kit with extensions or elbows as required.
notes.no_plume_needed: Standard terminal only; plume kit not required.
